messages.title: Campaigning to make a difference
messages.content: Dear friend, I'm from Croydon and I know what our town needs. A vote for Labour at this election is a vote to protect the NHS, to build more homes and to create a fairer economy. I hope you'll give me your support. Emily

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reduce the deficit every year to balance the books - but protect vital services like the NHS.
Build 200,000 new homes a year by 2020 as well as cap annual rent rises.
Provide 8,000 more GPs and 20,000 more nurses to build an NHS with time to care.
Raise the minimum wage to Â£8 per hour by 2020 to help make work pay.
Guarantee a job for 18-24 year olds after they have been out of work for a year.

issues.economy: Reduce the deficit every year to balance the books - but protect vital services like the NHS.
issues.health: Provide 8,000 more GPs and 20,000 more nurses to build an NHS with time to care.

housing.content: Build 200,000 new homes a year by 2020 as well as cap annual rent rises.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm campaigning on the issues that make a difference to people's lives - like the NHS and housing.

contactInformation.address: Ruskin House, 23 Coombe Road, Croydon, CR0 1BD

images.caption: Emily Benn leaflet with an image of her and the slogan 'Campaigning to make a difference'
